thread.title: 2 dead, 6 injured in Kashmir militant attack
thread.title_full: 2 dead, 6 injured in Kashmir militant attack

title: 2 dead, 6 injured in Kashmir militant attack
text:
2 dead, 6 injured in Kashmir militant attack IANS /Srinagar Filed on February 23, 2017 | Last updated on February 23, 2017 at 06.23 am Share 
(Reuters) The injured have been airlifted to Srinagar for treatment. An army soldier and a woman were killed and six other armymen including two officers were injured when militants ambushed security forces in Kashmir's Shopian district on Thursday."Militants ambushed and fired at the army in Chitargam village of Shopian district today morning," police said."The army was returning after carrying out a search operation in Kungoo village when they were ambushed by the militants," police added.One army Jawan and a woman were killed and in the attack, while six other army personnel including a lieutenant colonel and a major have been injured.The injured have been airlifted to Srinagar for treatment. Reinforcements were immediately rushed to surround the area and trace the militants. Share
